pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automatic Data Processing and Visualization for FRAP // Automatically process Fluorescence Recovery After Photobleaching (FRAP) data and generate consistent, publishable figures. Note: this package does not replace 'ImageJ' (or its equivalence) in raw image quantification. Some references about the methods: Sprague, Brian L. (2004) doi:10.1529/biophysj.103.026765; Day, Charles A. (2012) doi:10.1002/0471142956.cy0219s62.
